an6.56:3.1: muddhani → muddhānaṃ (bj, pts1), abhimattheyya → abhimatteyya (si) | abhimaṭṭheyya (s1-3), muddhani → muddhānaṃ (bj, pts1), ūhananti → hananti (bj, pts1) | ohananti (s1-3)
an6.56:8.1: hānanda, phaggunassa → hānanda phagguṇassa (s1-3) | pheggunassa ānanda (mr)
an6.56:10.2: na heva kho → no ca kho (mr)
